rukus.text: 71|1|Be gumon, Mo Nuhro ʙa suji qavmas firistodem [va guftem]: «Qavmi xudro – pes az on ki azoʙi dardnok ʙa suroƣason ojad – husdor deh [va ʙitarson]
71|2|[Nuh] Guft: «Ej qavm, man ʙaroi sumo ʙimdihandae oskor hastam
71|3|Ki Allohro ʙiparasted va az U parvo namoed va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
71|4|[Pas, agar cunin karded, Alloh taolo] gunohoni sumoro meomurzad va sumoro to zamoni muajjane muhlat medihad, zero hangome ki acali ilohi faro rasad, ta'xir naxohad dost, agar medonisted»
71|5|Va Nuh [pas az nasihatu da'vat] guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙa rosti, ki man qavmi xudro saʙu ruz [ʙa imon] da'vat kardam
71|6|Vale da'vati man cuz ʙa gurezason [az haq] naafzud

71|7|Va man har ci da'vatason kardam, to sarancomi ononro ʙijomurzi, angustoni xudro dar gushojason furu kardand va liʙoshojasonro [ʙa xud] pecidand va [dar muxolifat] isror [-u pofisori] kardand va ʙa siddat gardankasi va takaʙʙur namudand
71|8|On goh onhoro ʙo sadoi ʙaland [va oskor] da'vat kardam
71|9|On goh oskoro ʙarojason guftam va dar nihon ʙaroi [har kadom az] onon ʙajon kardam
71|10|Pas, guftam: «Az Parvardigori xes omurzis ʙixohed [ki] ʙe gumon, U ʙisjor omurzanda ast
71|11|To az osmon [ʙoroni] pajopaj ʙar sumo ʙifiristad
71|12|Va sumoro ʙo amvolu farzandoni ʙisjor jori kunad, ʙa sumo ʙoƣhoi [sarsaʙz] ʙidihad va ʙarojaton cujʙorho[-i cori] qaror dihad
71|13|Sumoro ci sudaast, ki ʙaroi Alloh taolo azamat [-u sukuh] qoil nested
71|14|Dar hole ki sumoro dar marohili gunogun ofarid
71|15|Ojo nameʙined, ci guna Alloh taolo haft osmonro ʙar farozi jakdigar ofarid
71|16|Va mohro dar mijoni osmonho mojai rusnoi qaror dod va xursedro caroƣi [furuzone] gardonid
71|17|Va Alloh taolo sumoro hamcun gijohe az zamin rujonid
71|18|Sipas sumoro ʙa on [zamin] ʙozmegardonad va ʙori digar sumoro ʙerun meovarad
71|19|Va Alloh taolo zaminro ʙaroi sumo gusturda soxt
71|20|To az rohhoi pahnovari on [ʙa suji maqsadi xud] raftuomad kuned»
